nodes.text: Gwend was a male individual who deserted the Galactic Empire. He helped several Askajians, including Borno, escape their homeworld of Askaj, which was being oppressed by the Imperial Grand Moff Wilkadon, and relocate to Tatooine. In 8 ABY, Gwend was located in the city of Motesta, and was working to bring another Askajian tribe to the desert planet. Around that time, Borno helped the Humans Han Solo and Leia Organa Solo evade Imperial capture on Tatooine, and offered to bring the Humans to the Motesta so they could meet Gwend.
Gwend was mentioned in the 2003 novel Tatooine Ghost, written by Troy Denning.
